file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 31-31-02-02 - FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the maintenance practices for the FDR underwater locator beacon (ULB). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON ALL 31-31-02-900-801-A (ULB) - RESTORE FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON ALL 31-31-02-960-801-A ♦ (ULB) - DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 31-31-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-02-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON (ULB) - RESTORE A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to restore the FDR underwater locator beacon (ULB). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400 FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOVAL FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 31-31-02-400-801-A/400 TION Honeywell CMM 31-30-40 - L3 CMM 31-30-03 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - Right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform - Hydraulic, Aircraft ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform (GSE 036) at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 31-31-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore FDR Underwater Locator Beacon SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Remove the ULB AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400. (2) (Aircraft with Honeywell FDR) Do the test of the ULB. To do this, refer to the last revision of Honeywell CMM 31-30-40. NOTE: If the test results are not satisfactory or the ULB is at or near the expiration date marked on the ULB, send the ULB back to the manufacturer for servicing. Refer to the last revision of Honeywell CMM 31-30-40. (3) (Aircraft with L3 FDR) Do the test of the ULB. To do this, refer to the last revision of L3 CMM 31-30-03. NOTE: If the test results are not satisfactory or the ULB is at or near the expiration date marked on the ULB, send the ULB back to the manufacturer for servicing. Refer to the last revision of L3 CMM 31-30-03. (4) Install the ULB AMM TASK 31-31-02-400-801-A/400. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close access door 272DR AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. (2) Remove the hydraulic platform (GSE 036). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 31-31-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 31-31-02-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON (ULB) - DISCARD A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to discard the FDR underwater locator beacon (ULB). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400 FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - REMOVAL FDR UNDERWATER LOCATOR BEACON - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 31-31-02-400-801-A/400 TION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage rear section Ι - Right side D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY To get access to the rear electronic compart- GSE 036 Platform - Hydraulic, Aircraft ment E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear electronic compartment I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Put up the hydraulic platform (GSE 036) at the necessary height. (2) Open access door 272DR AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. J. Discard FDR Underwater Locator Beacon SUBTASK 960-002-A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 31-31-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (1) Remove the ULB ( AMM TASK 31-31-02-000-801-A/400). (2) Install a new ULB ( AMM TASK 31-31-02-400-801-A/400) with the expiration date indicated on the ULB label in accordance with the expected life. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Close access door 272DR AMM MPP 06-41-01/100. (2) Remove the hydraulic platform (GSE 036).
